alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Barber and southeastern Comanche Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm producing a landspout near Buttermilk, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Aetna around 415 PM CDT. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
